mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MGL_CONTEST VALUES( CONCAT("CT",CAST(date_format(now(),"%y%m%d") as char(6)),LPAD((SELECT * FROM(SELECT MAX(MGL_CONTEST_SEQ) FROM MGL_SEQ) NEXT),3,0)), #{ct_start}, #{ct_end}, #{ct_startline}, #{ct_deadline}, #{ct_point}, #{ct_time}, #{ct_homepage}, #{ct_nm}, #{ct_host}, #{ct_supervision}, #{ct_support}, #{ct_sponsor}, #{ct_points}, #{ct_attach}, #{ct_inquiry}, #{ct_court}, #{ct_location}, #{ct_match_yn}, #{ct_yn} )
